alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 8:46AM CST until January 24 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon, cresting at a stage of 20.0 feet. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
